changeSet.author: d.bogatko
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `int_system_types` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC));

changeSet.author: d.bogatko
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO `int_system_types` (`name`) VALUES ('Jira');

changeSet.author: d.bogatko
d.bogatko
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `int_tts_types` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC));

changeSet.author: d.bogatko
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO `int_tts_types` (`name`) VALUES ('Xray');

changeSet.author: d.bogatko
d.bogatko
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `int_systems` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, `url` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, `username` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, `password` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, `api_token` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, `int_system_type` INT NOT NULL, `int_tts_type` INT NOT NULL, `project_id` INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC));

changeSet.author: d.bogatko
d.bogatko
changeSet.sql:
DROP procedure IF EXISTS `SELECT_INT_SYSTEMS`;
# CREATE PROCEDURE `SELECT_INT_SYSTEMS` ( IN request_id VARCHAR(20), IN request_name VARCHAR(20), IN request_url VARCHAR(100), IN request_username VARCHAR(20), IN request_password VARCHAR(20), IN request_api_token VARCHAR(20), IN request_int_system_type VARCHAR(2), IN request_int_tts_type VARCHAR(2), IN request_project_id VARCHAR(10) ) BEGIN SELECT * FROM int_systems WHERE empty_or_equal(request_id, id) AND empty_or_equal(request_name, `name`) AND empty_or_equal(request_url, `url`) AND empty_or_equal(request_username, `username`) AND empty_or_equal(request_password, `password`) AND empty_or_equal(request_api_token, `api_token`) AND empty_or_equal(request_int_system_type, int_system_type) AND empty_or_equal(request_int_tts_type, int_tts_type) AND empty_or_equal(request_project_id, project_id); END

changeSet.author: d.bogatko
d.bogatko
d.bogatko
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `int_test_references` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `key` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, `entity_id` INT NOT NULL, `project_id` INT NOT NULL, `int_system` INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC));

changeSet.author: d.bogatko
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `int_testrun_references` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `key` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, `entity_id` INT NOT NULL, `project_id` INT NOT NULL, `int_system` INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC));

changeSet.author: d.bogatko
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `int_issue_references` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `key` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, `entity_id` INT NOT NULL, `project_id` INT NOT NULL, `int_system` INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC));

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `int_system_workflow_status_types` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC));

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO `int_system_workflow_status_types` (`name`) VALUES ('Closed');

changeSet.author: d.bogatko
d.bogatko
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `int_system_workflow_statuses` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `project_id` INT NOT NULL, `int_system_id` INT NOT NULL, `wf_sts_type_id` INT NOT NULL, `name` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC));

changeSet.author: d.bogatko
d.bogatko
changeSet.sql:
DROP procedure IF EXISTS `SELECT_INT_SYSTEM_WORKFLOW_STATUS`;
# CREATE PROCEDURE `SELECT_INT_SYSTEM_WORKFLOW_STATUS` ( IN request_id VARCHAR(20), IN request_project_id VARCHAR(10), IN request_int_system_id VARCHAR(10), IN request_wf_sts_type_id VARCHAR(10), IN request_name VARCHAR(20) ) BEGIN SELECT * FROM int_system_workflow_statuses WHERE empty_or_equal(request_id, id) AND empty_or_equal(request_project_id, `project_id`) AND empty_or_equal(request_int_system_id, `int_system_id`) AND empty_or_equal(request_wf_sts_type_id, `wf_sts_type_id`) AND empty_or_equal(request_name, `name`); END

changeSet.author: d.bogatko
d.bogatko
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `int_system_tts_statuses` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `project_id` INT NOT NULL, `int_system_id` INT NOT NULL, `tts_type_id` INT NOT NULL, `status_name` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, `status_id` INT NOT NULL, `final_result_id` INT, `resolution_id` INT, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC));

changeSet.author: d.bogatko
d.bogatko
changeSet.sql:
DROP procedure IF EXISTS `SELECT_INT_SYSTEM_TTS_STATUS`;
# CREATE PROCEDURE `SELECT_INT_SYSTEM_TTS_STATUS` ( IN request_id VARCHAR(20), IN request_project_id VARCHAR(10), IN request_int_system_id VARCHAR(10), IN request_tts_type_id VARCHAR(10), IN request_status_name VARCHAR(20), IN request_status_id VARCHAR(20), IN request_final_result_id VARCHAR(20), IN request_resolution_id VARCHAR(20) ) BEGIN SELECT * FROM int_system_tts_statuses WHERE empty_or_equal(request_id, id) AND empty_or_equal(request_project_id, `project_id`) AND empty_or_equal(request_int_system_id, `int_system_id`) AND empty_or_equal(request_tts_type_id, `tts_type_id`) AND empty_or_equal(request_status_name, `status_name`) AND empty_or_equal(request_final_result_id, `final_result_id`) AND empty_or_equal(request_status_id, `status_id`) AND empty_or_equal(request_resolution_id, `resolution_id`); END

changeSet.author: d.bogatko
d.bogatko
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `int_system_log_publish` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `time` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, `project_id` INT NOT NULL, `int_system_id` INT NOT NULL, `run_id` INT NOT NULL, `run_ref` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, `result_id` INT NOT NULL, `test_ref` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, `status` INT NOT NULL, `issue_ref` VARCHAR(50), `submission_result` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC));

changeSet.author: d.bogatko
d.bogatko
changeSet.sql:
DROP procedure IF EXISTS `SELECT_INT_SYSTEM_LOG_PUBLISH`;
# CREATE PROCEDURE `SELECT_INT_SYSTEM_LOG_PUBLISH` ( IN request_id VARCHAR(20), IN request_time VARCHAR(50), IN request_project_id VARCHAR(10), IN request_int_system_id VARCHAR(10), IN request_run_id VARCHAR(10), IN request_run_ref VARCHAR(50), IN request_result_id VARCHAR(10), IN request_test_ref VARCHAR(50), IN request_status VARCHAR(10), IN request_issue_ref VARCHAR(50), IN request_submission_result VARCHAR(100) ) BEGIN SELECT * FROM int_system_log_publish WHERE empty_or_equal(request_id, id) AND empty_or_equal(request_time, `time`) AND empty_or_equal(request_project_id, `project_id`) AND empty_or_equal(request_int_system_id, `int_system_id`) AND empty_or_equal(request_run_id, `run_id`) AND empty_or_equal(request_result_id, `result_id`) AND empty_or_equal(request_test_ref, `test_ref`) AND empty_or_equal(request_status, `status`) AND empty_or_equal(request_issue_ref, `issue_ref`) AND empty_or_equal(request_submission_result, `submission_result`); END
